user_friendly_label: You are raising your children alone, without help from the other parent.
You share parenting responsibilities equally with the other parent.

status: Shared Custody (Other Parent is a Weekend/Occasional Parent)
user_friendly_label: You have shared custody but the other parent is only occasionally involved.
You must live near the other parent for legal or practical reasons.
You live far from your child(ren) and maintain remote contact.
You have lost one or more children.
